overview: On a frantic mission to fill his quota, Cupid (a bit disgruntled) gets reckless and starts shooting his arrow into any available target. Like a train wreck in a trailer park, his misguided missles of love cause a chain reaction of debauchery that turns everyone involved upside-down and ass-end up.
tagline: True Love is Perfect Unfortunately, His Aim Isn't
title: Stupid Cupid
